title: Longmont Police Notes: Dogs Fight Over Toys, No Injuries
title_page: Longmont Police Notes: Dogs Fight Over Toys, No Injuries
maintext:
There was a dog fight over toys Sunday in a dog park in Longmont that resulted in no injuries.
Longmont police responded to the area of 17th Avenue and Pace Street on Saturday for a report of a possibly drunk driver. A woman was arrested on suspicion of DUI.
Police investigated a hit and run accident in the area of Missouri Avenue and South Coffman Street on Saturday. The suspect was found and was issued a summons.
A man was arrested and a woman was summoned on suspicion of shoplifting Saturday in the 1200 block of South Hover Street.
A driver was arrested on suspicion of DUI on Saturday after a hit-and-run accident was reported in the 1800 block of Tyler Avenue.
Madeline St. Amour: 303-684-5212, mstamour@prairiemountainmedia.com
